page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT-SPETCHLEY AREA
page.content: Most local inhabitants are employed in {farming,}on{tenant}farms of the{Spetchley Estate.}The immediate estate of Spetchley Park employs 15 persons and there are 4 gardeners, and 2 woodmen employed within the grounds. There is a {fine forge }on the A422, where any item from farm machinery to wrought iron gates can be made. 2 men work here. There are{few new means}of employment in the area, although recently a {boarding kennels}and supplier of canine requisites has been opened in Bredicot village with the support of local people. The fruit farms of Sneachill also offer opportunities for seasonal,{casual}employment. As this is an agricultural area, employment opportunites for the young are fewer owing to mechanisation.
